Reviews.Title: Great Phone for Hearing Disable
Reviews.Author: David A. Goodrich
Reviews.Content: I like this phone because I am able to hear on it. I have a hearing disability and this phone has tele-coil capability which allows me to hear better on it.  It has a M3, T4 rating. It is a good phone for texting which has a QWERTY slider keyboard. A lot of features I cannot use because I am not an AT&T; customer even though it is an unlock phone. The only feature I do not care for is the thread capability of texts. For this reason, I did not give it a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!  Just like the one I had for three years.
Reviews.Author: jj
Reviews.Content: I had a Samsumg Strive for three years. Loved it. Had the opportunity to upgrade. Chose not to. The screen on that phone began to malfunction. I looked for a long time for another phone. Finally found and decided to buy this phone - same model as my old one. I have had no problems whatsoever. Quick delivery. I would recommend this phone and this seller to anyone! I hope this one lasts for another three years or more. I'll let my kids have my "upgrades"!

Reviews.Title: My Old Friend...
Reviews.Author: Michael Davis
Reviews.Content: I owned a Strive when I first started with my current carrier. About a year ago, the phone failed in its attempt to mimic a floatation device, so I got a loaner from a family member until it was time for my free upgrade, a Pantech touch screen phone that had a habit of ignoring the fact that the screen was locked. Getting a replacement Strive was a no brainer.Overall, it's a great workhorse phone. Quality sound, good signal strength, texting, video and pictures do a better than adequate job. There is, however, one failing with the phone, though in the end it's a minor inconvenience: from within the texting system, the file structure breaks down, with all files of a certain type lumped together rather than structured in their individual folders - annoying if you want to select one photo to send from the hundreds on your SD card. You can get around this by going into the file structure directly, selecting your file, and choosing to send it via message.

Reviews.Title: Ugh!!!
Reviews.Author: Biagio Cuomo "Biagio"
Reviews.Content: First phone did not work. Returned it. The second phone has screen problems and would not load up all of the information. I am giving up.

Reviews.Title: Perfect phone, received faster then accepted
Reviews.Author: Mohammed
Reviews.Content: I basically wanted this phone because it says it's factory unlocked so I could use it anywhere in the country I wanted a phone like this and I got it thank you very much everything works fine and its brand new no sign of damage. i give it 5+

Reviews.Title: phone shuts of after 5 min. of talk time........
Reviews.Author: ron weinstein
Reviews.Content: I purchase this phone because I had the same exact model for three years and the screen finally gave out.  This phone was good for a couple of months intill it started to shut off in about five minutes of talk time.  The phone showed low battery after charging it all night.  I can't return it now because it pass it's warranty.  Stuck with a defected phone!

Reviews.Title: Returned to Amazon
Reviews.Author: iris groves
Reviews.Content: I plugged this in to the charger and left it for 24 hours.  It never completely charged.  I returned it to Amazon.. I am sorely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: Jena
Reviews.Content: Read the reviews! Especially those that describe this phone's inability to charge fully, and it's propensity to suddenly lose what charge it has after minimal use. I read those reviews but, silly me,  gave it a try anyway.

Reviews.Title: horsh*t
Reviews.Author: King of Diamonds
Reviews.Content: I've bought this two different times with the same result  HORSESH*T. both were defective and had to be returned..don't buy!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: SmittyGirl
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cheap phone to use as a temporary phone until I can afford another Smartphone, and so far this one has done good. It still has internet access, which is nice. It texts and calls great too. The only things I don't like are the keys are really small, there is no headphone jack, and it doesn't have a speaker phone option. Otherwise its good.

Reviews.Title: The perfect featureless phone
Reviews.Author: Katherine Muller
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for three years of constant use/dropping on concrete/general mistreatment before the screen connection (from the sliding) came loose and I needed to replace it. I was even considering paying the full price on Amazon despite being eligible for a free non-Strive replacement phone on my plan.Pros:-Fantastic battery life: even texting and calling all day long it never died, the battery would last a WEEK on low/average use.-Indestructible: on multiple occasions I have tripped and launched it up in the air for a six foot drop onto concrete, there was at most a slight scratch on the corner.-Nothing went wrong: no one is buying this phone to get the best apps/features/camera, it's to have a functional calling and texting phone, three years of constant use and I'm not sure if it ever even turned itself off by accident, call quality was fine, alarms went off when they were set, texts were sent, etc.Cons:-Again, this phone does not have any features: you can set alarms and make clunky calendar notes, there is a camera but it's not worth bothering with.-Screen is a little dim: it's often very difficult to read in bright outdoor light and it looks oddly dim/distorted if you look at the screen from the side instead of head-on.-Minor oddities in programming: the phone has a couple of odd control quirks, but nothing major, if you're using the phone closed (not slid open) it will lock itself after a few seconds of non-use, the phone can automatically clear texts but not "conversations" (ie you will have "You, Jim, and Fred: 0 messages" listed in your inbox until you manually remove it), some other stuff, but none of it impacts the functionality.-Slight heating of the phone: if you are calling someone while charging the phone, the battery area of the phone will get warm. It's not so hot that you can't use the phone, and since the phone holds charge for so long anyway it's not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Bunz
Reviews.Content: This company has very great customber service help.. We bouth this phone on a Wednesday and received it in the mail on at a Friday already! Awesome fast shipping..  And when we received the phone there was nothing wrong with it but we just in particular weren't accustomed to the phone and they were more than happy to help us find the proper way to return the phone to them.  Awesome company to go through and great Customer Service!!

Reviews.Title: THIS CELLPHONE DOES NOT CHARGE THE BATTERY
Reviews.Author: D.Avila
Reviews.Content: I DONT RECCOMEND THIS CELLPHONE, FIRST ITS NOT TOUCHSCREEN, SECOND IT DOES NOT CHARGE THE BATTERY, I HAVE TO TAKE THE BATTERY OUT AND CHARGE IT WITH MY OLD CELLPHONE, I REALLY HATE THIS PHONE, AND I LIVE SO FAR AWAY FROM THE USA TO SEND IT BACK, SO I JUST FEEL THAT I LOSE MY MONEY BUYING THIS PHONE.

Reviews.Title: love this phone
Reviews.Author: mur11
Reviews.Content: I had this phone before, but was like 4 years old. So I decided that I needed a new oneand decided I would get the same one because it was such a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Junk, DOA
Reviews.Author: Lori2106
Reviews.Content: Junk phone, eats batteries - went thru 4 replacements and 8 batteries- ALL of them the same.Samsung admitted to me when I called for tech support, that these phones are no longer manufactured, and ATT says they had a high return rate so they discontinued them.JUNK and crappy seller, too. NO communication, period.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Scott Steagall
Reviews.Content: Love this phone. Does everything I need and the 2 megapixel camera does really well. Taking lots of video with it and picture and its the best phone for texing.

Reviews.Title: Simple did not work
Reviews.Author: Tea fan
Reviews.Content: This phone arrived and simple did not work I brought it for my daugther as a gift and it was embarrassing, So I can't give this phone a good rating But, they replaced it fast it was not the color we wanted but it worked and we needed a phone in a hurry.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone
Reviews.Author: Movies
Reviews.Content: Got for our son.  He liked it fine.  Now dad traded his iPhone with son and dad doesn't  like using this phone.  Small keys on key pad etc.  not used to it.  But my son liked it.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Milena
Reviews.Content: I received the item on time, in excellent condition and the way it was described. I love this phone and use it constantly.

Reviews.Title: DUD
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: Got the item later than the date, package was damaged, phone died the day after I powered it up and got it all personalized. Sent it back because I could not get a replacement. Love the design of the phone, though. Great for those not needing a smart phone as much.Update: I still haven't been refunded for my return. Got another phone, though, and it lasted about 8 hours and died. It wouldn't take a charge when I went to charge it. I'm very disappointed because I really like the phone, but is it the phone, battery or charger that doesn't work? I'm sending it back and trying again. Oh, I got the phone late again and in another damaged box. I'm hoping that the third time is the charm.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL SAMSUNG STRIVE!!!!
Reviews.Author: sherylsaltsman
Reviews.Content: The first one I orderedfrom Phone Etc. was defective. I had to return it. Decided to take another chance and order one agin. So glad I did. This phone is great and works wonderfully! It's the phone I have always loved the most. I will never have any other phone but a Samsung Strive a687.Thanks BREED for a great product!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: giltronical
Reviews.Content: I have a 13 yr old son whom I bought this phone for. I did not want for him to have a smartphone because of the high data fee rates and I believe its too vulnerable for him to have access to social media sites. I bought this used but it was still in great condition. thank you guys

Reviews.Title: Best Phone Ive had
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Among the many phones ive had, I would preferably have this one out of all of them.The response speed, the connection and the texting are UNMATCHED.the ONLY problem (which was the same reason I had to upgrade) was that the battery port would no longer charge my device =(

Reviews.Title: It is unlocked
Reviews.Author: Maky
Reviews.Content: I bought this product because I wanted an unlocked phone to take it to South America. I inserted the SIM, but the phone did not  accept it. I could not open the phone. I am going to return it.

Reviews.Title: worked fine for 2 days then down hill from there
Reviews.Author: Paul Henry "2237"
Reviews.Content: cell phone looked good, packaged well, timely delivery but worked fine for 2 days then down hill from there. Now no signal for calls or text.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: the phone worked great after the old one was dropped in the water this one did the trick and we have had no problem with it.

Reviews.Title: Like this Phone A Lot
Reviews.Author: Kit Catlin
Reviews.Content: Third one I've bought. Like it alot.  Keys are small for texting, but it's a great phone otherwise. No time for more words

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Fast 3G connectivity; Memory expansion via microSD card slot
GPS navigation capabilities via AT&T; Navigator service
Slide-down full QWERTY keyboard; 2-megapixel auto-focus camera
Bluetooth 2.0 connectivity with stereo music streaming (A2DP) capabilities
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Strive A687 Unlocked GSM Phone with 3G, GPS, 2MP Camera, Slide-down QWERTY Keypad, Bluetooth and microSD Slot - Black/Silver
